title: What's the Potential Impact of Force Majeure Claims on Financial Stability
description: This article examines the potential aggregate impact on financial stability of several bilateral force majeure claims filed at approximately the same time in one or more markets. One and a half years after the pandemic started, I take stock of the developments involving force majeure claims thus far, and conclude that the likelihood of these claims creating a systemic threat to financial stability is low.
dc:creator: Cocco, Alessandro
dc:subject: Force Majeure; Mortgage-Backed Securities; Derivative Contracts; Covid-19
